availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Alexander C. Seaton (Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and merchant)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, clerk and merchant. Kentucky native. Son of Harvey Seaton and Eleanor Boyd Seaton. Attended school in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Household owned two enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Clerk in Louisville in 1860. Household owned one enslaved person in Louisville in 1860. Merchant in Louisville in 1861. Clerk in Louisville in 1863. Merchant in Louisville in 1865.
